ingredient.li: Some pasta or rice or potatoes (optional!)
Ketchup or gravy or jam (depending on preference)

description.li: Take the meatballs out of the packaging. Now, cook them on medium to high heat for ten minutes.
Cook some side dish if you want (but no vegetables!!!).
Serve with ketchup or gravy or jam, and enjoy.

ingredient.li: Some jam or other topping that you like

description.li: Crack the eggs in a bowl, and mix in the milk and flour. Stir until it is well mixed.
Pour some batter in a frying pan and flip it when the first side is done. When second side is done, the pancake is done!
Repeat until batter is depleted. Now serve with some jam or fruit or chocolate or whatever.
